class.name: Phaser.LinkedList
class.help: A basic linked list data structure.

public.name: add
public.help: Adds a new element to this linked list.

parameters.name: child
parameters.help: The element to add to this list. Can be a Phaser.Sprite or any other object you need to quickly iterate through.

public.name: callAll
public.help: Calls a function on all members of this list, using the member as the context for the callback.\nThe function must exist on the member.

public.name: remove
public.help: Removes the given element from this linked list if it exists.

parameters.name: child
parameters.help: The child to be removed from the list.

public.name: reset
public.help: Resets the first, last, next and previous node pointers in this list.

public.name: total
public.inlineHelp: Number of elements in the list.
